Name: NKODICE
About the game: NKO DICE is an adaptation of a traditional Japanese dice game Chinchirorin. The game features graphics that recreate the atmosphere of a post-war Japanese gambling hall, along with traditional Japanese music. You can compete for scores in the online ranking, or watch the dice gracefully in the viewing mode.
